title: Poster, Exhibition Poster: Sigmar Polke, Neue Bilder (New Paintings), Galerie Heiner Friedrich, Munich, 1967
title_raw: Exhibition Poster: Sigmar Polke, Neue Bilder (New Paintings), Galerie Heiner Friedrich, Munich
inscribed:
Imprinted in black, top edge: "Sigmar Polke: Neue Bilder. Galerie Heiner Friedrich, München, Maxmilianstr. 15. Dienstag bis Samstag 10 bis 19 Uhr. 4 - 23. April 1967".
Imprinted lower center (white against black background): Druck Klien & Volbert München
creditline: Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment and Smithsonian Institution Collections Acquisition Program Funds
description: Art exhibition poster with dotted pattern in black and white: top half, mainly black dots on white; bottom half, mainly white dots on black.  At center, letters emerge out of the dotted pattern to read: Polke/Neue/Bilder (with " Neue" being hard to read as dot pattern "camouflages" into white and black areas). On verso, typed  German text about Polke's biography and exhibition record 1963-1967.

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, Exhibition Poster: Sigmar Polke, Neue Bilder (New Paintings), Galerie Heiner Friedrich, Munich, 1967. Offset lithograph. 
Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment and Smithsonian Institution Collections Acquisition Program Funds. 1999-45-21
